author: Pineapplehead66
title: Great place to stay
text: After reading s hat full of mixed reviews I decided to book. Pleased I did the hotel was great , staff were polite and helpful and the bars - wow they were brilliant . Rooms small but very clean indeed and beds were really comfortable . The hotel was Right next to Central Park too which meant a morning jog was great. If I could pick one thing to improve - a kettle and coffee in room would have been a nice touch . Would not hesitate booking again. Thank you .
